problemSection.description: Make data-driven decisions about where to invest your marketing budget, when to hire, and where there are opportunities for improvement.

problem.title: Before Using Databox
points: Data is scattered across multiple tools and teams
It takes too long to get the information you need
It's difficult to gain insights from your data
Decisions are based on intuition and assumptions
Creating reports manually takes a lot of time

solution.title: After Using Databox
points: A centralized source of truth for data
Your team or clients can access the answers they need instantly
Less time on reporting, more time on strategy

solutionSection.title: Work better in one shared space
solutionSection.description: Find all your team’s work—plans, conversations, docs, and more—in one place. So you can collaborate no matter where you are.

solutionSection.title: Streamline Your Workflow
solutionSection.description: Organize, track, and complete your tasks with ease. Gain visibility into your team's progress in real-time.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to commonly asked questions about our services.

items.question: How can I reset my password?
items.answer: To reset your password, go to the login page, click 'Forgot password?', and follow the instructions.

items.question: How do I update my billing information?
items.answer: You can update your billing information from the account settings under the 'Billing' section.

items.question: How can I contact customer support?
items.answer: You can contact our customer support via email or through the live chat on our website.

items.question: How do I delete my account?
items.answer: To delete your account, go to settings and select 'Delete Account' or contact support.
